Methods in com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl that return NEATGenome
 NEATGenome<GeneMap> StandardCrossoverOperator.crossover(int idNumber, Genome<GeneMap> genome1, Genome<GeneMap> genome2)
          Creates a child NEATGenome using the NEAT algorithm's crossover operation.
 NEATGenome<GeneMap> AddLinkMutateOperator.mutate(int idNumber, Genome<GeneMap> genome)
          Creates a child NEATGenome by adding a new LinkGene to the given genome's GeneMap that connects previously unconnected NodeGenes.
 NEATGenome<GeneMap> AddNodeMutateOperator.mutate(int idNumber, Genome<GeneMap> genome)
          Creates a child NEATGeneticsFactory by "splitting" a link in the GeneMap of the given Genome.
 NEATGenome<GeneMap> AdjustAttributesMutateOperator.mutate(int idNumber, Genome<GeneMap> genome)
          Creates a child NEATGenome by selecting Genes in the given Genome's GeneMap and adjusting them using RandomUtil.randomlyAdjustParameterGaussian(double, Range).
 NEATGenome<GeneMap> RemoveLinkMutateOperator.mutate(int idNumber, Genome<GeneMap> genome)
          Creates a child NEATGenome by removing a link from the given Genome's GeneMap.
